panels.description:
Clusters with CPU, Mem or Storage Headroom based on Percentile, Desired Capacity and HA settings.
Red = Critical and Attention Needed ASAP
Orange = Warning and Address ASAP before becoming Critical
Yellow = Minor Risk best to address so it doesn't get worse

targets.rawSql:
WITH percentiles as (
    WITH entities_by_cluster as (
        SELECT DISTINCT 
                   e.name as cluster_name
                  ,e.oid as cluster_oid
                  ,s.scoped_oid as entity_oid
                  ,s.scoped_type as entity_type
              FROM entity e 
              JOIN scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid
             WHERE e.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
               and s.scoped_type IN ('VIRTUAL_MACHINE', 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE', 'STORAGE')
               AND (e.first_seen, e.last_seen) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
               AND (s.start, s.finish) overlaps ($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
    ),

    data_by_entity as (
        SELECT entity_oid
              ,entity_type
              ,time
              ,max(consumed) FILTER (WHERE m.type = 'MEM' and m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE') as vm_mem
              ,max(consumed) FILTER (WHERE m.type = 'CPU' and m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE') as vm_cpu
              ,max(consumed) FILTER (WHERE m.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT' and m.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE') as vm_storage
              ,max(current) FILTER (WHERE m.type = 'MEM' and m.entity_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE') as mem
              ,max(current) FILTER (WHERE m.type = 'CPU' and m.entity_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE') as cpu
              ,max(current) FILTER (WHERE m.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT' and m.entity_type = 'STORAGE') as storage
          FROM metric as m
         WHERE $__timeFilter("time")
           AND type in ('CPU', 'MEM', 'STORAGE_AMOUNT')
           AND entity_type in ('VIRTUAL_MACHINE', 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE', 'STORAGE')
         GROUP BY 1, 2, 3
    ),
    
    vm_stats as (
        SELECT cluster_name
              ,cluster_oid
              ,AVG(vm_cpu) as cpu_consumed_perc
              ,AVG(vm_mem) as mem_consumed_perc
              ,AVG(vm_storage) as stor_consumed_perc
          FROM 
                (SELECT entity_oid
                      ,percentile_cont($Percentile) 
                           WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY vm_mem) as vm_mem
                      ,percentile_cont($Percentile) 
                           WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY vm_cpu) as vm_cpu
                      ,percentile_cont($Percentile) 
                           WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY vm_storage) as vm_storage
                  FROM data_by_entity dbe
                 WHERE dbe.entity_type = 'VIRTUAL_MACHINE'
                 GROUP BY 1) as data
          JOIN entities_by_cluster ebc on ebc.entity_oid = data.entity_oid
       GROUP BY 1, 2
    ),

    pm_stats as (
        SELECT cluster_oid
              ,percentile_cont($Percentile) 
                   WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mem) as pm_mem
              ,percentile_cont($Percentile) 
                   WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY cpu) as pm_cpu
              ,percentile_cont($Percentile) 
                   WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY storage) as ds_storage
          FROM (SELECT cluster_oid
                      ,time
                      ,SUM(cpu) as cpu
                      ,SUM(mem) as mem
                      ,SUM(storage) as storage
                  FROM data_by_entity dbe
                  JOIN entities_by_cluster ebc on ebc.entity_oid = dbe.entity_oid
                 WHERE dbe.entity_type in ('PHYSICAL_MACHINE', 'STORAGE')
                 GROUP BY 1, 2) as perc_data
         GROUP BY 1
    )

    SELECT vm_stats.cluster_name
          ,vm_stats.cluster_oid
          ,cpu_consumed_perc
          ,mem_consumed_perc
          ,stor_consumed_perc
          ,pm_cpu as cpu_used_perc
          ,pm_mem as mem_used_perc
          ,ds_storage as stor_used_perc
      FROM vm_stats
      JOIN pm_stats ON vm_stats.cluster_oid = pm_stats.cluster_oid
    ),

capacities as (
    WITH entities_by_cluster as (
        SELECT DISTINCT 
                   e.name as cluster_name
                  ,e.oid as cluster_oid
                  ,s.scoped_type as type
                  ,s.scoped_oid as oid
              FROM entity e
              JOIN scope s on s.seed_oid = e.oid 
               AND e.type = 'COMPUTE_CLUSTER'
               AND s.scoped_type IN ('PHYSICAL_MACHINE', 'STORAGE')
               AND e.last_seen > now()
               AND s.finish > now()
    ),

    pm_stats as (
      SELECT cluster_oid
            ,SUM(pm_cpu) as pm_cpu
            ,SUM(pm_mem) as pm_mem
            ,SUM(ds_storage) as ds_storage
            ,COUNT(distinct oid) FILTER (where entity_type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE') as pm_count
        FROM (
            SELECT cluster_oid
                  ,oid
                  ,pm.type as entity_type
                  ,MAX(capacity) FILTER (WHERE m.type = 'MEM') as pm_mem
                  ,MAX(capacity) FILTER (WHERE m.type = 'CPU') as pm_cpu
                  ,MAX(capacity) FILTER (WHERE m.type = 'STORAGE_AMOUNT') as ds_storage
              FROM metric as m
              JOIN entities_by_cluster as pm on pm.oid = m.entity_oid
             WHERE time >= now() - interval '30 min'
               AND m.type in ('CPU', 'MEM', 'STORAGE_AMOUNT')
               AND pm.type in ('PHYSICAL_MACHINE', 'STORAGE')
             GROUP BY 1, 2, 3) as a
       GROUP BY 1
    )

    SELECT pm_stats.cluster_oid
          ,pm_cpu as cpu_cap
          ,pm_mem as mem_cap
          ,ds_storage as stor_cap
          ,pm_count
      FROM pm_stats
)

SELECT cluster_name as "Cluster Name"
      ,CASE
         WHEN cpu_headroom < 0 THEN 0
         ELSE cpu_headroom
       END as "CPU Headroom VMs"
      ,CASE
         WHEN mem_headroom < 0 THEN 0
         ELSE mem_headroom
       END as "Mem Headroom VMs"
      ,CASE
         WHEN sto_headroom < 0 THEN 0
         ELSE sto_headroom
       END as "Storage Headroom VMs"
      ,CASE
         WHEN cpu_consumed < 0 THEN 0
         ELSE cpu_consumed
       END as "Avg VM CPU Consumed"
      ,CASE
         WHEN mem_consumed < 0 THEN 0
         ELSE mem_consumed
       END as "Avg VM Mem Consumed"
      ,CASE
         WHEN sto_consumed < 0 THEN 0
         ELSE sto_consumed
       END as "Avg VM Storage Consumed"
      ,CASE
         WHEN cpu_free < 0 THEN 0
         ELSE cpu_free
       END as "Avg Host CPU Free"
      ,CASE
         WHEN mem_free < 0 THEN 0
         ELSE mem_free
       END as "Avg Host Mem Free"
      ,CASE
         WHEN sto_free < 0 THEN 0
         ELSE sto_free
       END as "Avg Storage Free"
  FROM
    (SELECT percentiles.cluster_name
           ,coalesce(floor((cpu_cap*$DesiredCapacity*((pm_count-$HA)/pm_count::numeric) - cpu_used_perc) / NULLIF(cpu_consumed_perc, 0)), 0) as cpu_headroom
           ,coalesce(floor((mem_cap*$DesiredCapacity*((pm_count-$HA)/pm_count::numeric) - mem_used_perc) / NULLIF(mem_consumed_perc, 0)), 0) as mem_headroom
           ,coalesce(floor((stor_cap*$DesiredCapacity - stor_used_perc) / NULLIF(stor_consumed_perc, 0)), 0) as sto_headroom
           ,coalesce(NULLIF(cpu_consumed_perc, 0)*1000, 0) as cpu_consumed
           ,coalesce(NULLIF(mem_consumed_perc, 0)/1024, 0) as mem_consumed
           ,coalesce(NULLIF(stor_consumed_perc, 0), 0) as sto_consumed
           ,(cpu_cap*$DesiredCapacity*((pm_count-$HA)/pm_count::numeric) - cpu_used_perc)*1000 as cpu_free
           ,(mem_cap*$DesiredCapacity*((pm_count-$HA)/pm_count::numeric) - mem_used_perc)/1024 as mem_free
           ,stor_cap*$DesiredCapacity - stor_used_perc as sto_free
       FROM capacities
       LEFT JOIN percentiles ON capacities.cluster_oid = percentiles.cluster_oid) as a
  ORDER BY 2, 3, 4

panels.title: Headroom per Cluster

list.definition:
SELECT generate_series || '%' as __text,
       generate_series*.01 as __value
  FROM generate_series(50,95,5)
list.name: Percentile
list.query:

       generate_series*.01 as __value
  FROM generate_series(50,95,5)

list.query:
SELECT generate_series || '%' as __text,
       generate_series*.01 as __value
  FROM generate_series(70,100,5)

list.definition:
SELECT 'N-' || generate_series  as __text,
       generate_series as __value
  FROM generate_series(0,4,1)
list.name: HA
list.query:
SELECT 'N-' || generate_series  as __text,
       generate_series as __value
  FROM generate_series(0,4,1)
